General.Name: Chongqing YuXin Pingrui Electronic Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Chongqing YuXin Pingrui Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of general-purpose electronic control devices. The company's principal products include general-purpose igniters, magneto, converters, voltage regulators, sensors, relays, flywheels, etc. It also offers general machinery parts, agricultural machinery products, and new energy products. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Chongqing, China.
